short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows a cockroach walking on the screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a fun and interactive experience on your browser with the Cockroach Extension! Watch as realistic cockroaches multiply and move smoothly across your screen. Perfect for pranks or just a bit of quirky entertainment.
